org.spongepowered.api.event.impl

Class AbstractModifierEvent<T extends ModifierFunction<M>,M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.event.impl.AbstractEvent
      • org.spongepowered.api.event.impl.AbstractModifierEvent<T,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The modifier type to use
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAttackEntityEvent, AbstractDamageEntityEvent, AbstractHealEntityEvent

    public abstract class AbstractModifierEvent<T extends ModifierFunction<M>,M>
extends AbstractEvent
    An abstract base class for implementations of DamageEntityEvent and HealEntityEvent.
